def process_list_block(docstring, starting_point, section_end, leading_spaces, marker): import re ending_point = docstring.find('\n\n', starting_point) block = docstring[starting_point:(None if ending_point == -1 else ending_point - 1)] # Place marker for later reinjection. docstring_slice = block.replace('\n ', '\n' + marker).replace(marker + '\n', marker) docstring = docstring[:starting_point] + docstring_slice + docstring[section_end:] lines = block.split('\n') lines = [re.sub('^' + ' ' * leading_spaces, '', line) for line in lines] # Correcting the formatting of list items lines = [re.sub(r'^- ', r'
  • ', line) + '
    • ' if line.strip().startswith('-') else line for line in lines] block = '
      \n' + '\n'.join(lines) + '\n
    ' return docstring, block
